page.title: 12BUS PASS ROW IN DALGETY BAY
page.content: Recently in our area there has been a row about the giving of free bus passes to school children.The row has been going on for some time now,because many children are within the limits of two miles from {Inverkeithing High.}Even though people have different views about the matter it still looks like a fair majority of children in the{Bay}are not going to get their passes.Also many parents have been measuring the distance from their homes to the{High School}to see if their children should get passes,and to try and persuade the {Education Authority}to give one to all the children in{Dalgety Bay.}In our class only three children will get one.It will cost our parents about{Â£70 to us buy a season ticket.A return journey costs{36p}a day so we would save up about{Â£70.
